Transfigure (transform into something more beautiful or elevated) data frames

## Installation

You can install the development version of ezxfig from [GitHub](https://github.com/EricLamphere/ezxfig) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("https://github.com/EricLamphere/ezxfig.git")
```
